ygData.subject: Re: Running After KK
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She went running up the hill. LEAVE ME ALONE LAND MINE! She kept running, through the small trees and highier up the hill. She was fearful and angry.

::KitKat::

She went running up the hill. "LEAVE ME ALONE LAND MINE!"
She kept running, through the small trees and highier up the hill.
She was fearful and angry.  She couldn't understand why Land Mine was 
haunting her so.  She knew she had done the right thing.  She knew 
she had tried to help her friend and do what she thought was the 
right thing to do at the time.  Had she known the pain she would go 
through, she thought she would still do it again to save her friend 
from torture and pain.  But now she was in pain herself, 
She kept running and started yelling "LEAVE ME ALONE LAND MINE! GO 
AWAY!" As she ran further up the hillside. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> Drillbit followed KitKat, untill she yelled for him to leave her. He
> waited at the base of the mountin, for her.
> 
> ::K-9::
> 
> K-9 was running, when he picked up two Pred signatures.(KitKat and
> DrillBit.) He altered course, heading for them.
